column2: Source: City of Toronto summary budget documents. The general quality and availability of this data source is poor. We were unable to obtain matching staffing complement data for 2013. Caution: The staffing dataset for 2016, and most datasets before 2011, are pre-council approved. Roughly estimated re-allocations for continuity have been applied to the earlier years. The approved 2017 figures are estimated from changes to total (operating and capital) staffing from prelimiary, applied to preliminary operating..
